APIKEY.EXPLANATION: Before using Saaksi you need FMI's api-key to access the data. Follow the instructions below to get free api-key and copy it to the text-field below.

INSTRUCTIONS.1: Go to FMI's open data page and log in you account or register a new one.
INSTRUCTIONS.2: In your "Omat tiedot" page in bottom there should be "tunnisteavain (fmi-apikey)".
INSTRUCTIONS.3: Copy the api-key and paste it to the field below.
INSTRUCTIONS.SAVEINFO: The API-key is saved on your browser, not on Saaksi's server.
